title: Ceylon Tea exporters target US$ 5 billion by 2020
content: – by Janaka Alahapperuma – pix By : Nalin Hewapathirana – Chairman of the Tea Exporters’ Association (TEA) of Sri Lanka, Rohan Fernando presented their proposals to President Mahinda Rajapaksa to support the Government’s efforts to increase exports toward the goal of US$ 20 billion by 2020 with a tea contribution of US$ 3 to…
